[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [HydratableElementController](../fast-element.hydratableelementcontroller/index.html)

## HydratableElementController class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

An ElementController capable of hydrating FAST elements from Declarative Shadow DOM.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class HydratableElementController<TElement extends HTMLElement = HTMLElement> extends ElementController<TElement> 
```
**Extends:** [ElementController](../fast-element.elementcontroller/)<!-- -->&lt;TElement&gt;

<tr><td>

[needsHydration?](../fast-element.hydratableelementcontroller.needshydration/)


</td><td>

`protected`


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Controls whether the controller will hydrate during the connect() method. Initialized during the first connect() call to true when the `needs-hydration` attribute is present on the element.


</td></tr>
